Item.Name: Everything POP Shopping & Dining
Item.Content:
Everything POP Shopping & Dining in Disney's Pop Century Resort, Disney's Pop Century Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Everything POP Shopping & Dining

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90001527.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Pop in and choose food from any of 7 stations: grab ’n’ go items, grill fare, pizza, pasta, sandwiches, healthy choices and ethnic cuisine. Specialties include oven-fired flatbreads and house-made desserts.
  Cuisine: American
  Details: Disney Dining Plan Accepted

WDWNT Reviews

Coming soon!

Item.Name: Petals Pool Bar
Item.Content:
Petals Pool Bar in Disney's Pop Century Resort, Disney's Pop Century Resort, Walt Disney World

Details, tips, and information for Petals Pool Bar

Today's Hours
[jsoncontentimporter url=https://wdwntnowapi.azurewebsites.net/api/v2/mobile/restaurant/90002026.json]{TodaysHours}[/jsoncontentimporter]
Find your inner flower power at this groovy bar by the Hippy Dippy pool. Try house specialties like the tropical Banana Cabana or Island Moon-Shine, all while you play ping-pong! Cocktails, draft beer, sangria and wine are also available.
  Cuisine: American
